column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Prompt and friendly service
column2: plan your time accordingly if you're dining in. In this tourist's opinion between Malnati's and Giordano's
column3: Malnati's wins. The crust is more flavorful and I think has a better texture - and less dry. Don't get me wrong
column4: that stuffed pizza is good but if I had to choose between the two - BUTTERY CRUST #ftw
